LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.0.label: buzzed-hidden
LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.1.label: Inebriated (warm)
LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.1.description: I just feel a bit more relaxed after that drink. That's good.
LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.2.label: Inebriated (tipsy)
LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.2.description: I'm a bit wobbly! And this is quite enjoyable.
LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.3.label: Inebriated (drunk)
LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.3.description: I feel so uninhibited and unafraid! This is a great time!
LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.4.label: Inebriated (hammered)
LanguageData.Hungover.stages.0.label: Hungover (slight)
LanguageData.Hungover.stages.1.label: Hungover (strong)
LanguageData.Hungover.stages.1.description: My head hurts from all that liquor.
LanguageData.Hungover.stages.2.label: Hungover (pounding)
LanguageData.Hungover.stages.2.description: It feels like a gaggle of geese are pecking at my skull.
LanguageData.Hungover.stages.3.label: hungover-hidden
LanguageData.AlcoholWithdrawal.stages.1.label: alcohol withdrawal
LanguageData.AlcoholWithdrawal.stages.1.description: Feeling shaky. Everything pisses me off. I keep thinking of drinking.
